channel.title: Comments on: The Trip – Day 21 – Zion Park, Arriving At Las Vegas
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Actually what happened was that I went to a Starbucks to charge my gadgets. I didn't plan on it but I fell asleep right on my table for 2 hours or so. Later while I was waiting for my room I napped on the sofas of the New-York New-York hotel, where I'm staying right now (see my next post)
item.content:encoded: Actually what happened was that I went to a Starbucks to charge my gadgets. I didn’t plan on it but I fell asleep right on my table for 2 hours or so. Later while I was waiting for my room I napped on the sofas of the New-York New-York hotel, where I’m staying right now (see my next post)

item.title: By: 725176
item.description: Didn't you sleep all night? I really think you experience a lot and mostly - yourself in different backrounds... great!
item.content:encoded:
Didn’t you sleep all night?
I really think you experience a lot and mostly – yourself in different backrounds… great!
